name: Shoot Nazis with Punches and catch them in a Trash Can
name_original: Shoot Nazis with Punches and catch them in a Trash Can
description:
Shoot the parachuting nazis with boxing gloves on springs and catch them in a trash can!

•Combo system! All falling nazis should land in a trash can!

•Uhm... Bad music.

•And... mediocre at best sound effects

•Quite bad pixelart...

I think I should train this "promoting"-thing.

Anyway, made for Games vs Nazis-Jam.
